edu.northeastern.ccs.serverim

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.northeastern.ccs.serverim.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Each instance of this class represents a single transmission by our IM clients.

    This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/. It is based on work originally written by Matthew Hertz and has been adapted for use in a class assignment at Northeastern University.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(MessageType handle,
               java.lang.String sender,
               java.lang.String receiver,
               java.lang.String text,
               int isDeleted,
               long timeStamp,
               int timeoutMinutes)
        Instantiates a new message.
        Parameters:
        handle - the handle
        sender - the sender
        receiver - the receiver
        text - the text
        isDeleted - the bit to indicate if a message is deleted
        timeStamp - timestamp of message
        timeoutMinutes - timeoutMinutes for this message

      • Message

        public Message(MessageType handle,
               java.lang.String sender,
               java.lang.String receiver,
               java.lang.String text,
               int timeOutMinutes)
        Parameters:
        handle - handle for the message
        sender - sender name of the message
        receiver - receiver name of the message
        text - actual text content of the message
        timeOutMinutes - timeout in minutes after which the message cease to exist

        public static Message makeQuitMessage(java.lang.String myName)
        Create a new message to continue the logout process.
        Parameters:
        myName - The name of the client that sent the quit message.
        Returns:

      • makeBroadcastMessage

        public static Message makeBroadcastMessage(java.lang.String myName,
                                           java.lang.String text)
        Create a new message broadcasting an announcement to the world.
        Parameters:
        myName - Name of the sender of this very important missive.
        text - Text of the message that will be sent to all users
        Returns:
        Instance of Message that transmits text to all logged in users.

        Returns:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Representation of this message as a String. This begins with the message handle and then contains the length (as an integer) and the value of the next two arguments.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Representation of this message as a String.
